mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_day (week_id, day_number, title, content, status) VALUES (#{weekId}, #{dayNumber}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status});
mapper.select: SELECT day_id, week_id, day_number, title, content, study_time_min, status, learning_day_summary, created_at, updated_at FROM learning_day WHERE day_id = #{dayId};
SELECT day_id, week_id, day_number, title, content, study_time_min, status, learning_day_summary, created_at, updated_at FROM learning_day WHERE week_id = #{weekId} ORDER BY day_number ASC;

SELECT d.day_id, d.week_id, d.day_number, d.title, d.content, d.study_time_min, d.status, d.learning_day_summary, d.created_at, d.updated_at FROM learning_day d JOIN learning_week w ON d.week_id = w.week_id WHERE w.learning_id = #{learningId} ORDER BY w.week_id ASC, d.day_number ASC;
SELECT day_id, week_id, day_number, title, content, study_time_min, status, learning_day_summary, created_at, updated_at FROM learning_day WHERE week_id = #{weekId} AND day_number = #{dayNumber};
mapper.update: UPDATE learning_day SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, learning_day_summary = #{learningDaySummary}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE day_id = #{dayId};
